thread.title: NYPD Analyst Hunted al Qaeda Recruiter for Years. Now They’re a Team.

author: Jessica Donati
title: NYPD Analyst Hunted al Qaeda Recruiter for Years. Now They’re a Team.
text:
WASHINGTON—The New York Police Department analyst and the leader of a fanatical Islamist cell played a dangerous game of cat and mouse for years.
Jesse Morton was a Columbia University student who had converted to Islam, distributed al Qaeda propaganda and cultivated extremist followers. Mr. Morton believed that authorities were tracking him. He was correct. Mitchell Silber ran a team of NYPD intelligence officers that had infiltrated Mr. Morton’s extremist group as they walked a line between freedom of speech and incitement...
